name: Abby and The Time Trap
description:
ABBY AND THE TIME TRAP

This is an Adventure Game in which you are controlling  a  rocket named Abby to avoid the asteroids coming  towards you. Remember, Time to Time your speed slows down. You need mind and luck to play this because there can be a situation where you can't get through.

Well making this was SO MUCH FUN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
